body:
Rebased the branch onto `master` to fix conflicts, everything looks good. I had to correct a handful of things I missed in the rebase (see 108d73a0594930e59f4e8e51305fcaeb712fbd02 ), so I reckon that may need to be reviewed, but for the most part the code in this PR should be good to go.

@Osmose @rehandalal If y'all want to review this before merging, that'd be awesome. Thanks!
